name: advertising-sdk
description: This is the Advertising sdk for Nordic Game LLC websites

scripts.build: npx uglifyjs src/ads.js --module --compress --mangle -o ads.min.js --source-map "url='https://static.nordicgamelab.org/v1/ads.min.js.map'" && mkdir dist && mv ads.min.js dist/ads.min.js && mv ads.min.js.map dist/ads.min.js.map

author: Nordic Game Lab LLC
